column9:
Join Criteria 

Join PROV_FINAL.FDL_PROV_SPCLTY to
PROV_FINAL.FDL_PROV_LOC as below,

FDL_PROV_SPCLTY.CORP_ENT_CD =
FDL_PROV_LOC.CORP_ENT_CD
FDL_PROV_SPCLTY.PROV_ID =
FDL_PROV_LOC.PROV_ID
FDL_PROV_SPCLTY.PROV_LOC_ID=
FDL_PROV_LOC.PROV_LOC_ID

Filter Criteria
FDL_PROV_SPCLTY.RECORD_TYPE = 'C'
